DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the new algorithm is safety and effective in proposing the dosage and the timing of oral anticoagulant therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Validation of a New Algorithm for Computerized Dosing of Vitamin K Antagonist Therapy
DOC.criteria: to take oral anticoagulant therapy for at least 2 years to be in stable conditions for at last 3 months patients who need to perform surgery patients who interrupt therapy
